actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, Chapter 17, to expand eligibility criteria to provide direct admission or transfer to a nursing home, and direct admission to a private hospital on an emergency basis of certain veterans of the Mexican Border period and of World War I.

summary.text: Permits the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to authorize nursing home care at a non-veterans' facility for veterans who served in the Mexican border period or World War I. Authorizes reimbursement for emergency medical care for any disability of such veterans.
